pokemons.name: Jigglypuff
pokemons.description: Jigglypuff is a round, pink ball with pointed ears and large, blue eyes. It has rubbery, balloon-like skin and small, stubby arms and somewhat long feet. On top of its head is a curled tuft of fur.  It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.

pokemons.name: bulbasaur
pokemons.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokemon.
